RelatedSentence: The Galapagos Islands were named a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1978 .
The Galapaface I freighter veered off course last week , causing it to be stranded along the rocky shores of San Cristobal , one of the Galapagos Islands .
The Galapaface I freighter veered off course last week , causing it to be stranded along the rocky shores of San Cristobal , one of the Galapagos Islands .

Although recovery teams were able to remove much of the ship 's contents , including 19,000 gallons of diesel oil from the ship 's engine , which could have caused a severe oil spill and disrupted marine life from miles away , there is still room for concern .

The government of Ecuador declared an emergency in the Galapagos Islands , aware that the ship can still severely damage the frail ecosystem of the island chain , which suffered from a sizable oil spill near San Cristobal in 2001 .
